text: aur donon daravaaje qee taraph jhapat pade aur zulekha (ne peechhe se unaka kurta pakad kar kheecha aur) phaad daala aur donon ne zulekha ke khaavind ko daravaaze ke paas khada paaya zulekha jhat (apane shauhar se) kahane lagee ki jo tumhaaree beebee ke saath badakaaree ka iraada kare usakee saza isake siva aur kuchh nahin ki ya to kaid kar diya jae
